intro: Ouratea steyermarkii, commonly known as the Brazilian ouratea, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests. Its botanical features make it an important component of the understory vegetation in its native habitat.
